title: Sovereign cloud emerges as a defining force in modern AI adoption, says Greylock’s Jerry Chen
description: Sovereign cloud is taking on new importance as enterprises accelerate their artificial intelligence agendas and look for deployment models that balance innovation with clear lines of control. As AI takes on more of the work inside modern enterprises, leaders …
